Subject: Schedule Meeting for "Netwrix Support Ticket #00440838"

TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for following up on this.

We have scheduled a remote session for tomorrow at 4:30 PM IST.

Click the link below to join the conference at the specified date and time:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/81764041919?pwd=okXTKKNKAX8ZSRG46M9ETiipBbkwhX.1
Dial-in Info
+1 346 248 7799 
Additional numbers may be available upon entering the conference.  Additional Numbers

Meeting Number
81764041919

Password
046097
 
As during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualization environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).

This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.

Without having a snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.

Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:

-Putty

-Zoom


Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer

Subject: Schedule Meeting for "Netwrix Support Ticket #00440838"

TextBody:
Hello Kantikirit,

Thank you for following up on this issue.

We have scheduled the remote session to the closest available slot which is 15:30 PM IST.

Below are the details:

Click the link below to join the conference at the specified date and time:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/81281899337?pwd=l7xf5rgWgTCw6cJDoc9sqLGXoBemDM.1
Dial-in Info
+1 646 931 3860 
Additional numbers may be available upon entering the conference.  Additional Numbers

Meeting Number
81281899337

Password
233747
 
As during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualization environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).

This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.

Without having a snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.

Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:

-Putty

-Zoom


Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

TextBody:
Hello Kantikirit,

Thank you very much for your time and patience today.

To recap what we've done today was to delete the shadows from the sda5 partition that was around 95% occupied.

We deleted shadows older than 60 days and the occupation percentage went down around 40 so you have now a lot more space to use.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
